mil6.3.11:4.1: tattha → idaṃ padadvayaṃ bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
mil6.3.11:10.2: hetaṃ → hitaṃ (bj); hidaṃ (maku, pts-vp-pli1) | pahaṃsayati tusayati → pahaṃsati tussati (bj); pahaṃsīyati kuhīyati (si, pts-vp-pli1); hāsayati kuhiyati (maku)
